channel.title: SalvationX V1 Starting up a team
channel.description:
Well i decided to a server 317 called salvationX I am looking for coders quick so we can get started with the server, I can code myself but not pro so i am looking for other good coders.
I am looking for a hoster because my computer not very fast..
I have started this yet because i wanned start when i get coders... I am looking for a website devolopor aswell while we work on the server..
Reply back If u wanna help... :) ;) :D :cool: :rolleyes: :P

item.title: SalvationX V1 Starting up a team
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

The almighty Skyru has spoken!

:trollface:

Read full topic
item.source: SalvationX V1 Starting up a team

item.title: SalvationX V1 Starting up a team
item.dc:creator: @Skyru Skyru
item.description:
@Skyru wrote:

Blast0Scape:

say he is just wanting somone to do work for him

That is called ‘spoonfeeding’ and not alot members here don’t like that. The programmer will never learn anything unless he/she does it him/herself.

but like why does it matter if you say "wanna"? or stuff like that?p
People who correct others are just 'grammar nazis', that's all it is, some people don't care about grammar, some do. Simple as that.

Read full topic
item.source: SalvationX V1 Starting up a team

item.title: SalvationX V1 Starting up a team
item.dc:creator: @Blast0Scape Blast0Scape
item.description:
@Blast0Scape wrote:

[quote=“Skyru, post:14, topic:428545”][quote author=Blast0Scape link=topic=531237.msg3926928#msg3926928 date=1330309941]
Why is everyone bein a jerk to him? i understand why he doesnt want to just jump into things by himself, its boring as hell to code alone and to start a server alone… dang you dont have to prove yourself to being a dick
[/quote]No one is being a ‘jerk’ to him. They are simply stating that you have to be more prepaired to handle a development team. By the way this looks, he just wants someone to do the work for him, and 9/10 chances, people will not. Therefor, he must state what he wants to do as far as the development goes, what he’s looking for in a team… etc. That’s all these people are saying, they aren’t trying to be mean, Just trying to help.[/quote]

but everyone has to start somewhere, say he is just wanting somone to do work for him, or maybe just to help him understand things more, and he does need to present more, but like why does it matter if you say “wanna”? or stuff like that?

Read full topic
item.source: SalvationX V1 Starting up a team

item.title: SalvationX V1 Starting up a team
item.dc:creator: @Skyru Skyru
item.description:
@Skyru wrote:

[quote=“Blast0Scape, post:13, topic:428545”]Why is everyone bein a jerk to him? i understand why he doesnt want to just jump into things by himself, its boring as hell to code alone and to start a server alone… dang you dont have to prove yourself to being a dick[/quote]No one is being a ‘jerk’ to him. They are simply stating that you have to be more prepaired to handle a development team. By the way this looks, he just wants someone to do the work for him, and 9/10 chances, people will not. Therefor, he must state what he wants to do as far as the development goes, what he’s looking for in a team… etc. That’s all these people are saying, they aren’t trying to be mean, Just trying to help.

Read full topic

item.title: SalvationX V1 Starting up a team
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Rush Ags Rush
item.description:
@Ags_Rush wrote:

Most people don’t have a problem hosting like I do. I can’t because of having one router, then a extender upstairs, with a ethernet cord run to my computer. On top of all of that, it’s apple products. I might could host with it, but i prefer to just buy a 20$ vps. As for you, you are most likely on your dad’s computer, and he won’t let you. That or, you cannot change the settings without your father’s password. I suggest, you just buy a 20$ vps and have someone help you set it up. That’s basically what I did. I can tell you are young, by the way you talk and act on the forums.

Read full topic
item.source: SalvationX V1 Starting up a team

item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Html_-, post:7, topic:428545”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=531237.msg3880973#msg3880973 date=1326032775]
First of all your grammar is confusing, you put have instead of haven’t, wanned instead of wanted ect and this is poorly presented. Give more information to your project, honestly if i was looking to join a team and i found this i wouldn’t apply.
[/quote]
Well im not good at presenting stuff :mad:[/quote]
You should work on it, if you intend to lead a group in a project then you need to be prepaired.
